amendment.description: To provide an additional $100,000,000 to carry out the 21st Century Community Learning Centers Program under B of title IV of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1585 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 7 - 87. Record Vote Number: 344.

action.text: Amendment SA 1585 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11291-11292, S11302-11303, S11307; text: CR S11291) To provide an additional $100,000,000 to carry out the 21st Century Community Learning Centers Program under B of title IV of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1585 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 7 - 87. Record Vote Number: 344.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 1585 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 7 - 87. Record Vote Number: 344.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1585 proposed by Senator Ensign to Amendment SA 1542.
